transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Haan ji madam bolo.
Customer: Haan ji sir abhi aawaz aawaz aa rahi hai. Jab aap madam main wo bol raha hun jabhi search kar raha hun na search city near by accordingly state wise ka wo bylit aate the pehle lekin jo app update kiye the kya kiye the mere ko pata nahi tab se nahi aa raha.
Executive: Okay na?
Customer: Ek second aapne kuch video bhi bheje. Main aapko video jo screen recording ka jo video dala na usme clearly dikhta hai.
Executive: Wo video main dekh rahi hun ek second line pe rahiye main aapko guide karti hun.
Customer: Wo dekh kar mere ko kya hai whatsapp text karo abhi gadi pe hun abhi ghar ko ja raha hun lunch ke liye.
Executive: Sir aapko na iske liye video meet pe aana padega tabhi main aapko guide kar paungi ki aapko kahan se na city wali filter laga ke dekhni hai.
Customer: Okay madam aapko main free tab main free hota hun na tab main call karta hun aapko okay?
Executive: Theek hai aap aaj hi lekin hai na free hoke mujhe call kijiye kyunki aapne jo concern raise kiya uske regarding baat hi nahi ho pa rahi aap se sir. Ji madam lekin upar mein aap dekhoge na sir location pe mujhe abhi dikh raha hai location upar mein dekho catalog ko aise ye karoge na sir wahan pe location ka option aa raha hai sir upar mein main to dekh rahi hun sir.
Customer: Ji ji okay.
Executive: Okay okay okay.
Customer: To main aapko link share karwa dun?
Executive: Madam abhi bilkul nahi kar pata main jab kaam pe hota hun jabhi ho to abhi kaise abhi kaam chod ke abhi kaise video meet mein aa sakta hun bolo. Main aapko jabhi free hota hun na tab main hi call karta hun na jabhi dekho abhi mera complaint aisa aaya hai main aapko bol raha hun jab hone se aapko bolta hun na mere ko please mere ko dekho ek din mein 100 200 call ka hota hai pressure to iske beech mein aap itna mere ko ye hone se mere ko ye nahi hoga main tab free hota hun aap clearly mind free hoke aap se main baat karta hun okay madam.
Executive: Sir theek hai chaliye main aapko whatsapp pe hi bol deti hun aap mera number save kar lijiye theek hai. Chalo chalo main kara deta hun. Close kar do. Fir main call close kar dun sir?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai. Theek hai okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to filter by city.

- Wants resolution via WhatsApp text.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested a video meet for guidance.

- Executive offered to share instructions on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share instructions on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, app update, location filter
